comment.author: 96684819@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called 1910s Fashion, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Posed on the occasion of the annual lawn party on Governors Island in New York harbor, sponsored by the Army Relief Society, on May 25, 1911.  General Grant, son of former President Ulysses S. Grant, was commanding officer at the Governors Island military installation until his death from cancer in April, 1912.
